S

saveScore() - Method in class minesweeper.Minesweeper
This method opens a new window which is used to save score.
SaveScore - Class in minesweeper
This class manages score for Minesweeper.It also connects the game to a database and stores the scores over there.
SaveScore() - Constructor for class minesweeper.SaveScore
The class constructor instantiates many of class properties,connects game to database and adds documentListener to the JTextField to save the winners name.
setCol(int) - Method in class minesweeper.Square
Sets column on which we want our Square.
setDifficulty() - Method in class minesweeper.Minesweeper
This method creates difficulty and sets it
setFont(int) - Method in class minesweeper.Square
Sets the font for Square depending on its current size.
setIcon(String, boolean) - Method in class minesweeper.Square
This method sets an icon for our Square depending on the state and size of our Square.
setMainWindow(JFrame) - Method in class minesweeper.Difficulty
Sets mainWindow property of this class through which we can treat the window passed as parameter from another class.In this case we are using this to enable main game window.
setMainWindow(JFrame) - Method in class minesweeper.SaveScore
Sets the mainWindow property of this class.
setMined(boolean) - Method in class minesweeper.Square
Sets a mine in Square.
setMode() - Method in class minesweeper.Minesweeper
This method calculates the number of hidden mines the game is going to have depending on the difficulty selected.
setResult(int, int, LocalTime) - Method in class minesweeper.SaveScore
Calculates score depending on size,mines and time consumed in game.
setRow(int) - Method in class minesweeper.Square
Sets row for our Square
setSelected() - Method in class minesweeper.Difficulty
This method sets an int in selected property of class depending on the selected difficulty sets 0 for Easy,1 for Medium,2 for Hard and 3 for Custom.
setState(int) - Method in class minesweeper.Square
Sets the state of Square
Square - Class in minesweeper
This class creates cells for Minesweeper.
Square(int, int) - Constructor for class minesweeper.Square
The class constructor gives initial values to its properties
squareFontIcon() - Method in class minesweeper.Minesweeper
This method sets font and image for JButtons which are used for game play.
squareSetup() - Method in class minesweeper.Minesweeper
This method setups the Squares needed for game and adds ActionListener to them, it adds them to a JPanel which is on main Window of game.
state() - Method in class minesweeper.Square
gets the state of Square
